description:
Sun coverage for small heads. The cape provides neck protection and compresses easily for leaning back in a car or stroller. A buoyant foam core in the brim keeps the hat afloat if it falls out of the canoe. Breakaway chin strap provides security and safety.

  • Light nylon fabric dries quickly
  • Medium and large sizes have mesh side panels for ventilation. Not found in size small
  • Shieldtek DWR finish resists water and dirt
  • Dark coloured fabric under brim blocks glare
  • Buckle and strap adjust sizing
  • Adjustable chinstrap uses a gentle slider on the small size, and a toggle on the medium and large sizes
  • Small fits 1-3 years old (47-51.5cm). Medium fits 3-6 years olds (52-57cm). Large fits 6-12 years olds (55-58cm)
  • Hand washable in cold with mild soap. Line dry. Do not iron
  • Packs flat or rolls for travel, but it's best not to crease the brim
name: Sunday Afternoons Play Hat - Children to Youths
